customers.description: With T'Compro App, you can rediscover the experience of buying for your favorite products at your trusted local store.

1.text: Choose products from your favorite brands to get your order ready. Select details such as payment method and whether you prefer in-store pickup or delivery.

2.text: Browse nearby stores offering the products you’re looking for. Compare deals and choose the best option for you.

3.text: Sit back and wait for your delivery to arrive, or pick up your order when it’s ready in-store.

stores.description: Boost your sales and manage everything from one place.

1.text: Easily set up the app to function the way you manage your business: customers, product inventory, employees, and special offers.

2.text: Each order includes customer details, requested products, and preferences such as payment method and delivery or pickup. Review and start dispatching with a single click.

3.text: Keep track of your business finances with simple and easy-to-use auto-generated metrics.

customers.description: Know what some of our users who have already proved to buy with T’Compro have to say.

1.name: Camila Flores
1.comment: I find it comfortable to be able to order in advance, especially when I am in a rush. I make my order and it's ready when I'm there.

2.name: Thiago Quispe
2.comment: The minimarket where I usually buy has started operating with this app. It’s nice to save shopping lists and order with a few clicks.

3.name: Andrea García
3.comment: I love seeing the country modernize little by little. Although I enjoy going out, now I sometimes order for delivery.

stores.description: Know what some of our users who have already started promoting their business with T’Compro have to say.

1.name: Jorge Luis Salas
1.comment: Customers just place their orders, and by the time they arrive I already have them ready. It’s simple and very practical.

2.name: Emmanuel Sánchez
2.comment: My niece helps me attend the shop. This program helps us save time, and I can see she’s happier.

3.name: Elena Ríos
3.comment: I wanted a digital notebook to keep track of my customers payments. This app helps me a lot with that.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.intro: At T’Compro, we value and respect your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information while you use our app and services.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.description: While using the app, we only collect the information necessary to provide the service:

items.userData: Basic user data provided by Google (first name, last name, and email address).
items.orderHistory: Order history made through the app.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.description: The information we collect is used exclusively to:

items.processOrders: Process your orders and show you personalized results.
items.improveExperience: Improve the user experience and the service functionality.
items.contact: Communicate with you regarding your purchases or technical support.

section3.title: 3. Data Retention
section3.description: We only retain information as long as necessary for the service to function or until you request its deletion. You can request deletion by contacting support@tcompro.app.

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.description: We do not share, sell, or rent your personal information to third parties. In some cases, we may use external services (e.g., Firebase or Google) strictly for hosting or authentication, always under their respective privacy policies.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.description: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
section6.description: We may update this Privacy Policy at any time to reflect improvements or changes in the service. The date of the last update will be displayed at the beginning of the document.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.description: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you can contact us at support@tcompro.app.

terms-and-conditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terms-and-conditions.intro: Welcome to T’Compro. By using our app, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. The app is in MVP phase and may be subject to changes.

section1.title: 1. Use of the App
section1.description: T’Compro is a metamarkets platform that allows users to place orders digitally. You must use the app only for lawful purposes and must not share your credentials with third parties.

section2.title: 2. Registration and Accounts
section2.description: By registering, you provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for the security of your account and any activity that occurs under your session.

section3.title: 3. Ownership and Content
section3.description: All content within the app, including text, images, and functionalities, is the property of T’Compro. Reproduction without authorization is not allowed. For inquiries, contact support@tcompro.app.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.description: T’Compro is not responsible for errors in the app, service interruptions, or losses resulting from the use of the platform. The app is provided as-is and in MVP phase.

section5.title: 5. Changes to the Terms
section5.description: We may update these terms at any time. The date of the last update will be displayed at the end of the document.
